video_prompt: **Prompt:** Giant dragon performer on stage. Spotlights dynamically shift focus. The dragon turns, its glowing eyes scanning the audience. Tail swishes, disturbing the floor-length skirt. Claws subtly flex. Background architecture subtly brightens and dims.
image_prompt: Generate an image of a majestic, powerfully built reddish-brown dragon in a highly detailed, scaly costume, standing on a dark stage. Bright spotlights illuminate the dragon from above, highlighting its prominent horns, glowing orange eyes, and distinct lighter, scaly chest. It wears a reddish-brown sash and a floor-length, gold-trimmed skirt. Its sharp claws are visible on its hands and feet. The background is dimly lit with soft orange light from distant architectural elements, emphasizing a theatrical atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Spotlights dynamically shift focus. The dragon turns, its glowing eyes actively scanning the audience. Its tail swishes, causing ripples in the floor-length fabric. Claws subtly flex and unflex. Background architecture periodically brightens and dims.
